__TOC__

Hi I currently help run, teach, and create courses to help promote
and educate youths to young adults with Free Software. Some of our
classes/courses are Graphics Design, Audio Editing, 3D Graphics, 
PC Garage Diagnostic and Repair, and Beginner to Expert Server 
setup. All our classes/courses are done with Free Software 
applications, on Free Software Operating Systems.*

Our non-profit is called Community Free Software Group, Inc.
The web site is <nowiki>[[http://cfsg.org]]</nowiki>

If you would like a class or course designed for your needs,
or would like to volunteer your time for a good cause, 
you can contact selso at "cfsg" dot org. Or join our fourm 
here <nowiki>[[http://mail.cfsg.org/forum/]]</nowiki>
